name: The Waiting Room
description:
Wait! Don't click away.

You have to be patient.

This game has more than 24 hours of gameplay.
In the game "The Waiting Room" we wanted to mix a text adventure with an idler; getting literally a game where you have to idle.
This game was made by Martin Isla and Matias Paredes for the Ludum Dare 41 in roughly 50 hours with minor inconveniences. I want to say it's the first part of many more and better projects.

You can skip some dialogues with any key. Open only 0The Waiting Room.exe file. You just have to wait! ⏳⏳⏳

Take a screenshot if you beat the game and send it to me for a prize!

@MatyParedes96

@MartinSpuug
